name: Bean Partners
overview:
Bean is a business advisory house specialising in unlocking the growth potential of early stage companies through a process of developing, communicating, resourcing and implementing a strategy for expansion. In delivering this service we are highly pragmatic, perceptive and dynamic.

Bean brings a methodology as well as skills, resources and experience to assist entrepreneurs and venture teams to gain clarity over the future direction of their Company. These strategies typically involve some form of equity, hybrid or debt funding requirement.

Bean provides these services in two forms: -Advising directly to early stage Companies; and -Supporting larger Companies looking to grow through the acquisition of high growth potential early stage ventures.

Bean delivers these services through a team of Advisory ‘Partners’ who all have a rare combination of entrepreneurial experience, top tier business training and the support of Bean’s processes and methodology.
